overview: When the discussion started of doing a film starring Christian, the first thing he said was he wanted to top Dawson's 20-Load Weekend by doing the same but in just 24 hours. The result is Max Sohl's latest porn marathon, Christian: 24 Cocks In 24 Hours, which follows Christian as he takes as much cock and cum as he can over the course of a single day.
title: Christian: 24 Cocks In 24 Hours
